title: From the Web (FTW) #24: Ilaiyaraaja declares: There’s no composer like me
summary: In the interview, Ilaiyaraaja stated that there has never been — and will never be — a composer like him in cinema. His comment quickly went viral, sparking widespread discussion on social media.
full_review:
In the interview, Ilaiyaraaja stated that there has never been — and will never be — a composer like him in cinema. His comment quickly went viral, sparking widespread discussion on social media.

I have not seen the interview, but fuck yeah… more people need to own their greatness and not fall into the humility trap. 🙂
